channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech

item.title: Amazon carries Wall Street to the finish of another winning week and month
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon led the U.S. stock market on Friday to the finish of another winning week and month. The S&P 500 rose 0.3% and pulled closer to its all-time high set on Tuesday.
item.dc:creator: STAN CHOE, Associated Press, The Hill

item.title: S&P 500 jumps as strong Amazon, Apple scorecards reignite rally
item.description: US stocks gained on Friday as blowout earnings results from Amazon.com Inc. and a strong holiday forecast from Apple Inc. rekindled risk appetite.
item.dc:creator: Bloomberg, The Mercury News

item.title: Google, YouTube settle for $30M over allegations of collecting kids' personal data
item.description: The lawsuit alleged data was collected from children watching cartoons and nursery rhymes on YouTube.
item.dc:creator: Ben Mitchell, NewsNation

item.title: Visual Studio October update adds Claude coding models
item.description: Microsoft has released the October 2025 update for Visual Studio 2022 (v17.14). The new release makes the Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Claude Haiku 4.5 coding models available in the GitHub Copilot chat window.
item.dc:creator: Info World

item.title: Strengthening security with a converged security and networking platform
item.description: Today’s IT environment of multiple clouds, hybrid work, and the exploding popularity of AI has given cybercriminals unprecedented opportunities for launching attacks — and the traditional arsenal of tools organizations use to stop them isn’t working.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: How tiny drones inspired by bats could save lives in dark and stormy conditions
item.description: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) — Don't be fooled by the fog machine, spooky lights and fake bats: the robotics lab at Worcester Polytechnic Institute lab isn't hosting a Halloween party.
item.dc:creator: HOLLY RAMER, Associated Press, KRON4

item.title: GenAI can save employees 7.5 hours a week
item.description: Questions may linger about whether generative AI (genAI) is taking away jobs, but tools such as OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Google Gemini and Microsoft Copilot are apparently making employees more productive.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Google adds tiered storage to NoSQL Bigtable to reduce complexity, costs
item.description: Google has added a fully managed tiered storage capability inside its NoSQL database service Bigtable to help enterprises reduce the complexity and expenditure of storing data.
item.dc:creator: Info World

item.title: Meta shares slide after company projects higher expenses for 2026
item.description: Meta's stock slid in after-hours trading on Wednesday after the tech giant posted strong third-quarter results but warned that its expenses will be significantly higher in 2026 than this year. Like its rivals, Meta Platforms Inc.
item.dc:creator: BARBARA ORTUTAY, Associated Press, NewsNation

item.title: Phony AI-generated videos of Hurricane Melissa flood social media sites
item.description: One viral video shows what appears to be four sharks swimming in a Jamaican hotel's pool as floodwaters allegedly brought on by Hurricane Melissa swamp the area. Another purportedly depicts Jamaica's Kingston airport completely ravaged by the storm.
item.dc:creator: TAIMOOR SOBHAN and KELVIN CHAN, Associated Press, NewsNation

item.title: Nvidia moves to build AI-native 5G/6G wireless stack for future networks
item.description: Nvidia is working with a cadre of industry expert at Booz Allen, Cisco, MITRE, ODC, Nokia and T-Mobile to bring an AI-native wireless stack for 6G networking to fruition.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11: The things you don’t see
item.description: While there were solid improvements in the last generation of Apple’s popular wearable, the huge 24-hour battery life in Apple Watch Series 11 means this smartwatch has finally become what it always promised to be: a device capable of running all day and all night, which is especially for tasks like
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Cisco, Nvidia strengthen AI ties with new data center switch, reference architectures
item.description: Cisco and Nvidia are ramping up their partnership, and the latest deliverables include the new Cisco N9100 series data center switch built on Nvidia’s Spectrum-X Ethernet switch silicon.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Big Tech rethinking human workforce amid AI push
item.description: The World Economic Forum predicts 92 million jobs could be lost by 2030 — but another 170 million jobs could be created.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Bass, NewsNation

item.title: Signal: We have no choice but to use AWS
item.description: Last week, the privacy-focused messaging service Signal was temporarily shut down when Amazon Web Services (AWS) suffered a major outage. This led to criticism of Signal’s use of such a dominant provider as AWS.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Eclipse LMOS AI platform integrates Agent Definition Language
item.description: The Eclipse Foundation has introduced ADL (Agent Definition Language) functionality to its LMOS (Language Models Operating System) AI project. The announcement came on October 28.
item.dc:creator: Info World

item.title: Nvidia looks to power AI factory networks
item.description: Networking technology took center stage at Nvidia’s GTC DC developers show in Washington, D.C. as a range of networking products were introduced for high-performance AI inference processing and more.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: A new framework aims to build a bridge across the defense acquisition valley of death
item.description: "We're hacking the complexity of the defense acquisition system so America's technologists can focus on solving technology problems," said Keoki Jackson. The post A new framework aims to build a bridge across the defense acquisition valley of death first appeared on Federal News Network.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gerton, Federal News Network

item.title: Elon Musk launches AI Grokipedia to compete with Wikipedia
item.description: The site comes after conservatives have criticized Wikipedia for exclouding some conservative outlets from its list of reputable sources.
item.dc:creator: Steph Whiteside, NewsNation

item.title: Beware fake credit card account restriction scams
item.description: A phishing email scam targeting American Express customers shows how cybercriminals use fake urgent messages to steal personal and financial information.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Meta AI edits your camera roll for better Facebook posts
item.description: Facebook's new Meta AI feature analyzes your camera roll photos to create polished collages automatically, but requires cloud processing and raises privacy concerns.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: Teen sues AI tool maker over fake nude images
item.description: A New Jersey teenager filed a major lawsuit against AI/Robotics Venture Strategy 3 Ltd. over ClothOff, an AI tool that created fake nude images from her social media photos.
item.dc:creator: Fox News
